idea-plugin.name: Inspection API
idea-plugin.vendor: Shiny Computers (Chris Busillo and Claude Code)
idea-plugin.description:
Exposes JetBrains IDE inspection results via HTTP API for automated tools and AI assistants.

Features:
  • HTTP API access to inspection results
  • Smart status detection (not run, running, complete)
  • Full project scope inspection support
  • Works with all JetBrains IDEs

Endpoints available at http://localhost:63341/api/inspection/*
